segments.text: I'm looking into this kitchen, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate with such careful precision.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can hardly believe what's happening right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is truly overflowing, water sheeting down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in the middle of that spreading water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like a small disaster is unfolding unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry she's going to slip and fall any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage to those nice cabinets will be extensive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how focused someone can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems utterly peaceful, lost in her dish-drying world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could get messy very quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't take my eyes off that stream of water.
segments.speaker: PAR
